Non-mewtonian cat
===

A game made for the [js13k 2025](https://js13kgames.com/) game jam.

![Screenshot of the game](/img/screenshot.png)

Listen to the soundtrack [here](https://phoboslab.org/synth/#).

## Build

Requirements:
- [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/)

Install dependencies:
```sh
npm install
```

Build:
```sh
npm run build
```

Dev server:
```sh
npm run dev
```

Build final zip:
```sh
npm run all
```

## Credits

music: https://github.com/phoboslab/pl_synth

color palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/lemonade
